revision.text:
{{Wad |name = Happy New Year! 2011 Edition |author = Gabriel "Barney Calhoun" Schlegel (aka Fellowzdoomer) |iwad = Doom2 |type = m |status = Abandoned }} == Description ==
Happy New Year! 2011 Edition - Whats a better way to celebrate new years than a nice kill 'em! Flynn "Doommarine" Taggaret wants to celebrate New years eve but has to fight evil when he notices a weird door. Beware whats behind the door. It could be your last door you'd ever open... (P.S. It has 2 Levels. Due to me doing it on New years eve, I had a bit of a rush.) Due to closing of site the mod is in progress.
EDIT: wow, ever since 2011 this thing has been up. Good times, really. Sadly, I no longer have the file, so now this project is now deemed as...
'''ABANDONDED'''
